alert.note: Alert for Las Vegas Valley; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 05 at 11:27AM PST until March 05 at 7:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. High elevation peaks and ridges could see gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...Western Clark and Southern Nye County, Spring Mountains- Red Rock Canyon and Las Vegas Valley. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds will make driving difficult for motorcycles...large trucks...trailers and campers. Some power outages could occur and unsecured outdoor items could be blown around or away.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Las Vegas Valley; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
